/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the sides of the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment.
